titles.title: Hydroelectric Fairness Act of 1988
A bill to prevent the takeover of pre-1935 hydroelectric projects on non-navigable rivers.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: 10/20/1988--Introduced. Hydroelectric Fairness Act of 1988 - Amends the Federal Power Act to prohibit the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission from issuing a license for the operation of any existing hydroelectric project located on non-navigable waters and unimproved since August 26, 1935, to anyone but the project's owner.
